title: News View :: The World On Arirang
text: The United States is remaining tightlipped on North Korean leader Kim Jong-un's recent decision to remove all South Korean facilities at its tourist site of Mount Geumgang.The U.S. State Department has yet to comment on the matter.U.S. President Donald Trump hasn't mentioned it either.Only media outlets have commented on Kim's remarks, with the Washington Post saying it signifies Kim's frustration about the lack of progress in inter-Korean economic projects due to the regime's stalled nuclear talks with the U.S.The AP was less sure, saying it was unclear what point Kim was attempting to make.
description: 한국을 대표하는 글로벌 방송! The World On Arirang!
